content.raw:
it is a little shame to ask the question, but I do need help!
the OS is ubuntu16.04, and I have followed the step of the "Installation". First, I am  Unable to locate package libignition-rndf0-dev as many times I tried. Then, I try to install from the source, the error comes out:

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:12 (find_package):
  By not providing "Findignition-cmake0.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this
  project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by
  "ignition-cmake0", but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-cmake0"
  with any of the following names:

    ignition-cmake0Config.cmake
    ignition-cmake0-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "ignition-cmake0" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or
  set "ignition-cmake0_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.
  If "ignition-cmake0" provides a separate development package or SDK, be
  sure it has been installed.


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!

AND I try to install ignition cmake as follows:
sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake pkg-config
hg clone #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake /tmp/ign-cmake
cd /tmp/ign-cmake
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ../
cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/$USER/local ../
make -j4
sudo make install
--------------------------------------------------
It shows that I install the ignition cmake successfully.
BUT!!!  the error of "ignition-camke0" is not fixed at all.
I do need help.
content.html:
it is a little shame to ask the question, but I do need help! the OS is ubuntu16.04, and I have followed the step of the "Installation". First, I am Unable to locate package libignition-rndf0-dev as many times I tried. Then, I try to install from the source, the error comes out:

CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:12 (find_package): By not providing "Findignition-cmake0.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-cmake0", but CMake did not find one.

Could not find a package configuration file provided by "ignition-cmake0" with any of the following names:

ignition-cmake0Config.cmake
ignition-cmake0-config.cmake

Add the installation prefix of "ignition-cmake0" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set "ignition-cmake0_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files. If "ignition-cmake0" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has been installed.

-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!

AND I try to install ignition cmake as follows: sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake pkg-config hg clone #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake /tmp/ign-cmake cd /tmp/ign-cmake mkdir build cd build cmake ../ cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/home/$USER/local ../ make -j4 sudo make install

It shows that I install the ignition cmake successfully. BUT!!! the error of "ignition-camke0" is not fixed at all. I do need help.
